attributes.action: Make our Jails more like those abroad
attributes.additional_details:
A petition to make jails a place people don't actually want to go back to. no TV's and playstations. Cold food 1 hour of heating and white walls. 10 to a room. No game and only 1 hour of leisure a day. You should walk through those pearly gates and lose all human rights.
Better still sent them all to war, that will sort the men from the boys!
